name: Sample Options
description: Provide a description of the program that these optinos are for

options.name: User
options.description: Sets the user name for the process

options.name: Binary
options.description: Sets a binary true/false toggle without a parameter, which sets the named options Selected property to true ( default is false )

options.name: Output
options.description: Sets the output file name to be used by the application. If a full path is not provided, it willl use the current working directory, if not provided, it defaults to 'TruistPayablesFile.csv'
